items.text: full toss on the stumps, he wasn't expecting that perhaps. Gets the bat down a tad late, but straight and it goes past the bowler, where mid-off mops up
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: outside edgeslower ball, beat him completely. He tried to turn this full ball round the corner from offstump, but was too early to close the face. The ball squirts to the third man boundary off the edge
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: classy in complete contrast to the last ball, this one is full and in the slot, and he unfurls the cover drive
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, punched ,but this time can't get past the cordon
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Mehidy coming into the attack, round the wicket
items.text: full and angled into the batsman, he tucks it away to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: reverse sweep but no contact with the bat. But the batsman's movement was enough to make the keeper try to anticipate and go around, missing it entirely
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 4 byes

items.text: defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: reverse sweep again, but straight to third man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: nails the conventional slog-sweep> The reverses were not working, so he goes down on one knee and picks it up with great timing to deposit it over midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, SIX runs

items.text: goes straight down the ground that time. Didn't time it as well, but the ball has enough legs to roll into the boundary, after landing over mid-off's head
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.preText: Saurabh's taking a short break. Hello everyone. Momentum for Zimbabwe after a watchful start. Can they sustain this surge?
items.text: length on middle and leg, kept a touch low, but he's solid in defence
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: slower and fuller, angling away, steered to third man.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: gets on top of the bounce and defends this short of length ball back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: authoritative free-flowing on-drive to this full toss, but has picked out mid-on. Scoring opportunity missed.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: confident forward stride as he punches this length delivery to extra cover.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: width outside off, he's flayed this on the up but straight to sweeper cover.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 run

items.preText: Mehidy to continue from round the stumps
items.text: too full and Taylor has drilled this to beat mid-off. Cracking stroke.
items.postText: Terrence: "I really like this Zhuwawo guy, he just needs to learn how to keep his wicket otherwise he is an aggressive hitter." -- Tends to lose his shape when he tries to bring out the big hits. But yes, the intent is quite nice. If he can work on his execution....
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: gets outside the line of off and works this down to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.preText: Bangladesh taking a lot of time between deliveries to set  their fields. They're behind on the over-rate
items.text: makes room to go over long-off, ends up slicing it over extra cover. Didn't get to the pitch of the delivery but went through with the stroke anyway
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: flatter one on middle and leg, tucked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: drifting into middle and leg and Zhuwao has taken full toll of that. Down on one knee as he sweeps him into the square leg boundary. Superb execution this time
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, FOUR runs

items.text: lofted, but he's holed out to long-off. Impatience has got the better of him. Not sure why he needed to play such a stroke at a time when the runs were flowing freely, but credit to the bowler as well. Mehidy tossed it up on middle, there's a hint of drift as the batsman made room, cramped for room as a result but went through with the lofted hit and simply managed to toe-end this to long-off.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, OUT

dismissal.text: C Zhuwao c Fazle Mahmud b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 20 (27b 1x4 1x6) SR: 74.07

items.preText: Sean Williams walks in at No. 4 with a solid repair job being the need of the hour for Zimbabwe
items.text: slants a length delivery across the left-hander, defended from the crease.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: right behind the line of this short of length delivery on leg, defended.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.preText: Shah Safeer: "I haven't seen a good innings from B Taylor in a while. Hope he sets up the game nicely by living up to his lofty standards."
items.text: solid stride forward as he defends with his bat close to the pad.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run
